Trade/Device Name(s): N Antisera to Human Complement Factors (C3c, C4)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for N Antisera to Human Complement Factors (C3c, C4) for quantitative immunonephelometric determination of complement factors in serum and plasma
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic reagents for the quantitative determination of complement factors (C3/C3c and C4/C4c) in human serum or heparinized or EDTA plasma by means of immunonephelometry on the BN Systems as an aid in the diagnosis of immunologic disorders associated with complement C3 or C4 protein.
